title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) Regulation 5 shall come into operation on the 4th day of May 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2021 (2) regulation 5 shall come operation 4th day may 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph
text_raw:
4. Regulation 3(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph 
(b) of the definition of “vaccinated person”, by the insertion of “, also known 
as ‘Covishield’,” after “ChAdOx1-SARS-COV2’ ”.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 168 of 2021) to provide 
that the Regulations shall remain in operation until 10 May 2021. They also 
provide for the recommencement of all services relating to construction and 
development and a technical amendment.
